headline: Occidental Beats Q3 Profit Estimates on Higher Production
summary: The Buffett-backed oil producer reported $649 million or 64 cents per share in net income adjusted for nonrecurring items for the third quarter.

raw.headline: Occidental Beats Q3 Profit Estimates on Higher Production

headline: Warren Buffett Has Been a Net Seller for 3 Years, but He’s Buying These 3 Stocks
summary: Warren Buffett has taken a highly conservative approach to the stock market in recent years. However, he has bought Chevron (NYSE:CVX), UnitedHealth Group (NYSE:UNH) and Pool Corp (NASDAQ:POOL) in the most recent quarter. He has been selling stocks for three straight years in a row, or 12 consecutive quarters. This does not mean that he’s selling ... Warren Buffett Has Been a Net Seller for 3 Years, but He’s Buying These 3 Stocks

headline: As Warren Buffett Nears His Exit, Berkshire's Amassed Record Cash
summary: After 60 years with Berkshire Hathaway, Warren Buffett is nearing retirement. In the lead-up to his exit, the firm has amassed a $381 billion cash reserve.

raw.headline: As Warren Buffett Nears His Exit, Berkshire's Amassed Record Cash
raw.summary: After 60 years with Berkshire Hathaway, Warren Buffett is nearing retirement. In the lead-up to his exit, the firm has amassed a $381 billion cash reserve.
